synopsis.text:
Kyojin chaos descends upon Tokyo Skytree as the iconic tower becomes the latest battleground for the fearless Survey Corps in this special anime feature. The formidable Wall Skytree, a crucial part of the fortified city, faces an imminent threat from an army of titans, led by a colossal 350-meter titan that mysteriously appears beside the Skytree, standing ominously still.

In this exhilarating short, the beloved characters from "Attack on Titan" are stationed at the Sky Survey Corps, tasked with the daunting mission of safeguarding the tower and its inhabitants. As the titanic invasion looms, Eren, Mikasa, Connie, and their comrades must rally together and utilize their unique abilities to thwart the impending disaster. With the legendary Levi lending his expertise, can our heroes rise to the challenge and protect the Skytree from the onslaught of monstrous foes? Join the Survey Corps in their epic battle against the titans and witness the fate of Tokyo Skytree unfold!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
